DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether the investigational drug INCB013739 has an effect on systemic and adipose tissue 11-HSD1 activity in obese, insulin resistant subjects.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of the Effect of INCB013739 on Cortisone Reducing Enzyme Activity in Obese People Predisposed to Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Male and female subjects between 18 years and 65 years of age. BMI between 30 and 42 kg/m2, inclusive. FPG <126 mg/dL Meet criteria for diagnosis of diabetes mellitus at the screening evaluation, female subjects with a history of gestational diabetes are permitted. Are receiving oral antidiabetic agents within the 3 months prior to screening.
